title: Maladex: Cardano Index Funds
description: Investors with the multitude of Cardano projects to choose from are unable to invest in all of them and control the risks involved.
solution: Maladex passive investment protocol offering a range of indexes from Cardano DeFi to fractional NFTs ownership funds.
experience: Experienced Haskell developers with years of experience in building advanced trading systems in top performing financial institutions.
